Name: Amp_Kana_Chl_VH_B
Description: The coding genes after this regulator are turned OFF ONLY under this condition: Ampicillin>9 or Kana>9 or Chl>9 or Cu>30 or Growth >450

Name: Amp_Kana_Chl_Cu_VH_A
Description: The coding genes after this regulator are turned OFF ONLY under this condition: Ampicillin>9 or Kana>9 or Chl>9 or Cu>9 or Growth >500

Name: Amp_Kana_Chl_H_1
Description: The coding genes after this regulator are turned OFF ONLY under this condition: Ampicillin>19 or Kana>19 or Chl>19 or Cu>19 or Growth >450

Name: Cu_H_1
Description: The coding genes after this regulator are turned OFF ONLY under this condition: Cu>29 or Growth >400

Name: Cu_L_1
Description: The coding genes after this regulator are turned OFF ONLY under this condition: Cu>29 or Growth >450

Name: Lactose
Description: 受lactose激活的开关，对抗生素高敏感

Name: IPTG
Description: 受IPTG激活的开关，对抗生素高敏感

Name: GOD
Description: 永远不会被关闭的调控基因
